001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.protobuf.Message;
004import io.micronaut.context.annotation.Context;
005import io.micronaut.context.annotation.Factory;
006
007import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
008import javax.annotation.concurrent.Immutable;
009import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe;
010
011
012/**
013 *
014 * @param <Model>
015 */
016@Factory
017@Immutable
018@ThreadSafe
019public final class CollapsedMessageCodec<Model extends Message> implements ModelCodec<Model, CollapsedMessage> {
020  /** Builder proto-type used to spawn new instances. */
021  private final Message.Builder builder;
022
023  /** Singleton access to serializer. */
024  private final CollapsedMessageSerializer serializer = new CollapsedMessageSerializer();
025
026  /** Singleton access to de-serializer. */
027  private final CollapsedMessageDeserializer deserializer = new CollapsedMessageDeserializer();
028
029  private CollapsedMessageCodec(@Nonnull Message.Builder builder) { this.builder = builder; }
030
031  /**
032   * Create a collapsed message codec which adapts the provided builder to {@link CollapsedMessage} and back. These
033   * "collapsed" messages follow the framework-defined protocol for serializing hierarchical data.
034   *
035   * @param <M> Model type for which we will constructor or otherwise resolve a collapsed message codec.
036   * @return Collapsed message codec bound to the provided message type.
037   */
038  @Context
039  public static @Nonnull <M extends Message> CollapsedMessageCodec<M> forModel(Message.Builder builder) {
040    return new CollapsedMessageCodec<>(builder);
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Acquire an instance of the {@link ModelSerializer} attached to this adapter. The instance is not guaranteed to be
045   * created fresh for this invocation.
046   *
047   * @return Serializer instance.
048   * @see #deserializer() For the inverse of this method.
049   * @see #deserialize(Object) To call into de-serialization directly.
050   */
051  @Override
052  public @Nonnull ModelSerializer<Model, CollapsedMessage> serializer() {
053    return serializer;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Acquire an instance of the {@link ModelDeserializer} attached to this adapter. The instance is not guaranteed to be
058   * created fresh for this invocation.
059   *
060   * @return Deserializer instance.
061   * @see #serializer() For the inverse of this method.
062   * @see #serialize(Message) To call into serialization directly.
063   */
064  @Override
065  public @Nonnull ModelDeserializer<CollapsedMessage, Model> deserializer() {
066    return deserializer;
067  }
068
069  /** Serializes model instances into {@link CollapsedMessage} objects. */
070  private final class CollapsedMessageSerializer implements ModelSerializer<Model, CollapsedMessage> {
071    /**
072     * Serialize a model instance from the provided object type to the specified output type, throwing exceptions
073     * verbosely if we are unable to correctly, verifiably, and properly export the record.
074     *
075     * @param input Input record object to serialize.
076     * @return Serialized record data, of the specified output type.
077     * @throws ModelDeflateException If the model fails to export or serialize for any reason.
078     */
079    @Override
080    public @Nonnull CollapsedMessage deflate(@Nonnull Message input) throws ModelDeflateException {
081      return null;
082    }
083  }
084
085  /** De-serializes model instances from {@link CollapsedMessage} objects. */
086  private final class CollapsedMessageDeserializer implements ModelDeserializer<CollapsedMessage, Model> {
087    /**
088     * De-serialize a model instance from the provided input type, throwing exceptions verbosely if we are unable to
089     * correctly, verifiably, and properly load the record.
090     *
091     * @param model Input data or object from which to load the model instance.
092     * @return De-serialized and inflated model instance. Always a {@link Message}.
093     * @throws ModelInflateException If the model fails to load for any reason.
094     */
095    @Override
096    public @Nonnull Model inflate(@Nonnull CollapsedMessage model) throws ModelInflateException {
097      return null;
098    }
099  }
100}
